price: 77.Yahuuduy tama umaaneena Abta mataaxigaa Diggah Yalli usun Qellissi haanam kee yaybulleenim inkih keenik yaaxigem?
arabic: أَوَلَا يَعۡلَمُونَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعۡلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعۡلِنُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: awalā yaʿlamūna anna al-laha yaʿlamu mā yusirrūna wamā yuʿ'linūna
